original_text: Every man of the children of Israel shall pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father's house: far off about the tabernacle of the congregation shall they pitch.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 각각 자기의 진영의 군기와 자기의 조상의 가문의 기호 곁에 진을 치되 회막을 향하여 사방으로 치라

sentences.original_text: Every man of the children of Israel
shall pitch by his own standard
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 자기 깃발 곁에 진을 칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: with the ensign of their father's house
far off about the tabernacle of the congregation
